ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting really Annoyed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have known 4 poofers (one with two very painful poofs in the last month), and have been a poofer myself *grin* Tszaaz [Non-text portions of this message
ygData.messageBody:
> Cool, now I can tell everyone at work I finally met someone
> who has seen an
> item poof. We have somewhere in the neighborhood of 25 EQ'ers
> here and I
> just polled them to be sure it had not happened to them. It
> hadn't, except
> for one guy before they put in the Lore Item duplicate looting code.

I have known 4 poofers (one with two very painful poofs in the last month),
and have been a poofer myself *grin*

Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
